name: Murder The Homicidal Liu - Into Damnation
name_original: Murder The Homicidal Liu - Into Damnation
description:
Murder The Homicidal Liu - Into Damnation

Murder The Homicidal Liu - Into Damnation is an epic title of Poison Games. In this game, you must survive the nightmare that is Liu. This homicidal threat arises and will stalk you no matter where you go. In the previous title you were eliminating Jeff the Killer - this new threat, however, makes Jeff seem like a walk in the park. Liu haunts you everywhere and you must use cunning, strategy and raw firepower to defeat her.

The graphics in this horror game lovers dream are fantastic. Furthermore, the intense and challenging gameplay is brilliant. Armed with different weapons such as dual pistols, Liu must be brought down so that her homicidal rampage is brought to an end.

As you move through each room don’t forget to look for clues and keep a watchful eye for your nemesis. If you enjoy adventure games, you will find the intensity and horror aspects of Murder The Homicidal Liu engaging. Moreover, if you have played other titles such as Slendrina Must Die, you will appreciate what Poison Games have done with this new title. Can you defeat the nightmare that haunts the city and send The Homicidal Liu into damnation?

Controls
  • WASD or arrow keys to walk around
  • Mouse to look around
  • Left Mouse Button to fire
  • Right Mouse Button to aim
  • Mouse Wheel to change weapon
  • R to reload
  • F to pick up an item
  • Left shift to run
  • Left Ctrl to crouch
  • X to prone
  • Space bar to jump

Made by:
